mapper.sql:
FROM CodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND CodeGroupCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND CodeGroupNameEN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.CodeGroupCode ,a.seq ,a.name ,a.CodeGroupNameEN ,a.CodeGroupRegDate ,a.CodeGroupModDate ,(select count(aa.seq) from Code aa where 1=1 and aa.DelNy = 0 and aa.cg_seq = a.seq) as seqCount ,a.DelNy
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.seq ,a.name ,a.CodeGroupCode FROM CodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = 0
SELECT a.CodeGroupCode ,a.seq ,a.name ,a.CodeGroupNameEN ,a.CodeGroupRegDate ,a.CodeGroupModDate ,a.DelNy FROM CodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE CodeGroup SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
